thread.title: Manchester United transfer news: Wayne Rooney tipped to rejoin Everton | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news: Wayne Rooney tipped to rejoin Everton | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United transfer news: Wayne Rooney tipped to rejoin Everton | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 4:32 pm Wayne Rooney could rejoin Everton, says Martin Keown (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United captain Wayne Rooney could end up sealing a transfer back to his old club Everton, according to Arsenal legend Martin Keown. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The 31-year-old is being strongly linked with a surprise move to the Chinese Super League before the close of their transfer window at the end of February. 
Former United defender Gary Neville has already advised Jose Mourinho not to risk selling him until the summer , while Keown has weighed in by saying he thinks Rooney still has something to offer in the Premier League. Rooney is no longer a regular at Old Trafford (Picture: Getty) Rooney burst onto the scene with his wondergoal against Arsenal in 2002 (Picture: Getty) 
‘I feel that he has still got a lot to offer,’ Keown told the Daily Mail . 
‘I wouldn’t be surprised if he ended up back at Everton. He’s 31-years-old! If I were him I wouldn’t accept the situation I find myself in. It’s far too young.
